name: Popty's Poptisserie
description:
RECIPE 🍬 🍭 🍬

Popty's Poptisserie is a small, casual delivery game set in a monochrome town of Halloween monsters.  It can be played in a single sitting.

You are an apprentice pastry chef who works for the eponymous Popty, a friendly brownie who owns the local bakery. Your task is to explore the town, remember orders, and deliver the right desserts — all while learning about monsters and their favorite recipes. 

You may even learn how to bake a few yourself!

DIRECTIONS 🍬 🍭 🍬
  • WASD  . . . . . move
  • SPACE  . . . . . interact / use
  • ESCAPE . . . . . options
  • TAB . . . . . menu

COOK TIME: 🕗 20 - 25 minutes 

INGREDIENTS  🍬 🍭 🍬
  • All music featured is by Cafofo Music, from their Halloween Sound Pack.
